page.title: 12Education in St.Leonard's
page.content: The district contains a wide variety of educational establishments.A number of playschools cater for pre-school groups.On attaining school age children attend St.Leonard's C.E. School,which is quite new,Pebsham C.P. School,which was built not long ago to cater for children in the expanding Pebsham area of Bexhill,or W.St.Leonard's C.P.School,at which there is a Language Unit for children who are learning English as a 2nd. language.The main secondary school is The Grove where,in July 1985,a new extension was opened for 1st.& 2nd. year pupils,formerly taught over a mile from there.There are 2 small, private co-educational schools,an independent R.C.girls' school,2 special schools for children with physical and mental handicap,and the Hastings College of Arts & Technology.
